<#setting locale = "es_MX"> <#setting time_zone= "America/Mexico_City"> <#setting number_format=",##0.00"> <#assign "dataXML" = "">
<#if custom?has_content> <#if custom.dataXML?has_content> <#assign "dataXML" = custom.dataXML>
</#if> <#setting locale=custom.locale> <#assign labels = custom.labels> <#if custom.certData?has_content> <#assign "certData" = custom.certData> <#else> <#assign "certData" = record> </#if> <#if custom.multiCurrencyFeature == "true"> <#assign "currencyCode" = record.currencysymbol> <#assign exchangeRate = record.exchangerate?string.number> <#else> <#assign "currencyCode" = "MXN"> <#assign exchangeRate = 1> </#if> <#assign "satCodes" = custom.satcodes>
<#if custom.oneWorldFeature == "true"> <#assign "customCompanyInfo" = record.subsidiary> <#else> <#assign "customCompanyInfo" = companyinformation> </#if> <#if customer.isperson == "T"> <#assign customerName = customer.firstname + ' ' + customer.lastname> <#else> <#assign "customerName" = customer.companyname> </#if> <#assign "summary" = custom.summary> <#assign "totalAmount" = summary.subtotal - summary.totalDiscount> <#assign "companyTaxRegNumber" = custom.companyInfo.rfc>
<#assign currencySymbolMap = {"USD":"$","CAD":"$","EUR":"€","AED":"د.إ.‏","AFN":"؋","ALL":"Lek","AMD":"դր.","ARS":"$","AUD":"$","AZN":"ман.","BAM":"KM","BDT":"৳","BGN":"лв.","BHD":"د.ب.‏","BIF":"FBu","BND":"$","BOB":"Bs","BRL":"R$","BWP":"P","BYR":"BYR","BZD":"$","CDF":"FrCD","CHF":"CHF","CLP":"$","CNY":"CN¥","COP":"$","CRC":"₡","CVE":"CV$","CZK":"Kč","DJF":"Fdj","DKK":"kr","DOP":"RD$","DZD":"د.ج.‏","EEK":"kr","EGP":"ج.م.‏","ERN":"Nfk","ETB":"Br","GBP":"£","GEL":"GEL","GHS":"GH₵","GNF":"FG","GTQ":"Q","HKD":"$","HNL":"L","HRK":"kn","HUF":"Ft","IDR":"Rp","ILS":"₪","INR":"টকা","IQD":"د.ع.‏","IRR":"﷼","ISK":"kr","JMD":"$","JOD":"د.أ.‏","JPY":"￥","KES":"Ksh","KHR":"៛","KMF":"FC","KRW":"₩","KWD":"د.ك.‏","KZT":"тңг.","LBP":"ل.ل.‏","LKR":"SL Re","LTL":"Lt","LVL":"Ls","LYD":"د.ل.‏","MAD":"د.م.‏","MDL":"MDL","MGA":"MGA","MKD":"MKD","MMK":"K","MOP":"MOP$","MUR":"MURs","MXN":"$","MYR":"RM","MZN":"MTn","NAD":"N$","NGN":"₦","NIO":"C$","NOK":"kr","NPR":"नेरू","NZD":"$","OMR":"ر.ع.‏","PAB":"B/.","PEN":"S/.","PHP":"₱","PKR":"₨","PLN":"zł","PYG":"₲","QAR":"ر.ق.‏","RON":"RON","RSD":"дин.","RUB":"руб.","RWF":"FR","SAR":"ر.س.‏","SDG":"SDG","SEK":"kr","SGD":"$","SOS":"Ssh","SYP":"ل.س.‏","THB":"฿","TND":"د.ت.‏","TOP":"T$","TRY":"TL","TTD":"$","TWD":"NT$","TZS":"TSh","UAH":"₴","UGX":"USh","UYU":"$","UZS":"UZS","VEF":"Bs.F.","VND":"₫","XAF":"FCFA","XOF":"CFA","YER":"ر.ي.‏","ZAR":"R","ZMK":"ZK"}> <#function fmtc_NS value> <#return currencySymbolMap[currencyCode] + value?string[",##0.00"]> </#function>
<#function fmtc value> <#return currencySymbolMap[currencyCode] + value?number?string[",##0.00"]> </#function> </#if>

Forma de pago: <#assign forma_pago = record.custbody_mx_txn_sat_payment_method?keep_before(" ")> <#if forma_pago == "01"> 01 - EFECTIVO <#elseif forma_pago == "02"> 02 - CHEQUE NOMINATIVO <#elseif forma_pago == "03"> 03 - TRANSFERENCIA ELECTRÓNICA DE FONDOS <#elseif forma_pago == "04"> 04 - TARJETA DE CRÉDITO <#elseif forma_pago == "05"> 05 - MONEDERO ELECTRÓNICO <#elseif forma_pago == "06"> 06 - DINERO ELECTRÓNICO <#elseif forma_pago == "07"> 07 - TARJETAS DIGITALES <#elseif forma_pago == "08"> 08 - VALES DE DESPENSA <#elseif forma_pago == "09"> 09 - BIENES <#elseif forma_pago == "10"> 10 - SERVICIO <#elseif forma_pago == "11"> 11 - POR CUENTA DE TERCERO <#elseif forma_pago == "12"> 12 - DACIÓN EN PAGO <#elseif forma_pago == "13"> 13 - PAGO POR SUBROGACIÓN <#elseif forma_pago == "14"> 14 - PAGO POR CONSIGNACIÓN <#elseif forma_pago == "15"> 15 - CONDONACIÓN <#elseif forma_pago == "16"> 16 - CANCELACIÓN <#elseif forma_pago == "17"> 17 - COMPENSACIÓN <#elseif forma_pago == "23"> 23 - NOVACIÓN <#elseif forma_pago == "24"> 24 - CONFUSIÓN <#elseif forma_pago == "25"> 25 - REMISIÓN DE DEUDA <#elseif forma_pago == "26"> 26 - PRESCRIPCIÓN O CADUCIDAD <#elseif forma_pago == "27"> 27 - A SATISFACCIÓN DEL ACREEDOR <#elseif forma_pago == "28"> 28 - TARJETA DE DÉBITO <#elseif forma_pago == "29"> 29 - TARJETA DE SERVICIOS <#elseif forma_pago == "30"> 30 - APLICACIÓN DE ANTICIPOS <#elseif forma_pago == "31"> 31 - INTERMEDIARIO PAGOS <#elseif forma_pago == "98"> 98 - N/A <#elseif forma_pago == "99"> 99 - POR DEFINIR <#else>
</#if>

Folio Fiscal Certificado Digital SAT Fecha de certificación

<#if datearray?size == 2 > <#assign dayarray = datearray[0]?split("-")> ${dayarray[2]}/${dayarray[1]}/${dayarray[0]} ${datearray[1]} <#else> ${certData.custbody_mx_cfdi_certify_timestamp} </#if>
